data.title: Lily & Lime
data.meta_description: Lily & lime is a wedding photography and videography company with a photojournalistic style and trained team of wedding photography experts.
data.text:
Affordable wedding photography

A wedding day is a day borrowed from the movies and love songs, a day designed to make you and your partner feel special, loved, and celebrated. Shining brighter than all the other days in your calendar, your wedding day is surely special - and deserves all the excitement that it draws! After months of meticulous wedding planning,marking out checklists, touring wedding venues, swapping color swatches and trying pretty wedding dresses, and taking care of every big little detail, the wedding day arrives amidst a blur of activities and a rush of emotion.

Lily & Lime

Affordable wedding photography

Wedding albums are not just pictures, but memories that live on forever and become family assets over time! Remember how crazy it felt flipping through your parent's or grandparent's wedding day, and looking into those pictures which seem to capture the magic of the moment in time? The way your grandma swayed to the music and laughed, throwing her head back? And the way your grandfather looked like he just won a lottery? Do you ever notice how their eyes light up looking at those photos, like they have stepped into the past?

Lily & Lime

Affordable wedding photography

So when your time rolls in and you have the date, the flowers, and the dress, you’ll want perfect stills from the most perfect day, too. You will want to capture it all and maybe flip through them later and pass it on to the next generation! You don't want any of the precious moments to be lost in the folds of the time-the way the look in your partner's eyes reflected in yours as you walked down the aisle, the way you shared an inside joke, and the way you spun and swang to the tune during the first dance. All of those gems of memories would be missed if not for wedding photographs.

Lily & Lime

Affordable wedding photography

If you are a couple looking forward to getting married-congrats on finding your one! You said “Yes'' without skipping a heartbeat and things haven’t been the same ever since-in the most beautiful way! You must already be knee-deep in the enchanting world of wedding planning, and between admiring your engagement ring, searching for DIY wedding ideas, and comparing prices between wedding vendors you are working on finding the right fit in everything.

Lily & Lime

Affordable wedding photography

Lily & Lime offers affordable wedding photography services for every bride and groom who dreams of seizing the memories waiting to be captured. We believe that wedding day is made in heaven, but the lasting memories are made through our camera lens. Capturing those precious, magical moments hidden unceremoniously are some of the very best, and something that your wedding photographer needs to have a keen eye for! After all, when the sun shines on you the next morning, you will be married!

Getting to know Lily & Lime

Everybody wants perfect wedding photographs at the end of it all, but as imperative as photography is to weddings, the budget for a wedding photographer can be intimidating, to say the least! We believe that the recollections of your wedding day shouldn’t come with a heavy price tag. Stunning photos of your wedding day should come in easy and affordable, as every couple heading towards the new chapter of their life merits the gift of being able to hold the memories of their wedding close.

Getting to know Lily & Lime

Photos from the most precious day in your life are not only to fill the wedding album but also fill your heart with joy in recollection of a day that was near perfect! Having these pictures to have and hold is the kind of simple pleasure that we believe all couples are entitled to. Having an affordable wedding photography service at your reach, no matter where you live, can be just the thing most lovebirds need. And that is exactly what Lily & Lime provides! A chance to book a high-quality, photojournalistic wedding photography for you and yours, likened to the ease of ordering your favorite pizza online.

Getting to know Lily & Lime

Lily and Lime offers the ease and approachability of beautiful budget wedding photography, combined well with the quality and complexity of a premium photo service, enabling couples to take home the best of both worlds (but most importantly the memories of the day)! Lily & Lime takes the stress out of wedding photography, and allows you and your partner to just enjoy the day, while we take care of capturing the beautiful moments in artistic frames! Whether you are a bride with a big-wedding dream, or a bride on a budget, hosting a small and intimate wedding, or a last-minute backyard wedding,

Getting to know Lily & Lime

we at Lily and Lime have your back and will help you find the best wedding photographers available in your area. You can seize the beautiful moments of your wedding day without hassle or a dent in your wedding budget, and all that from the comfort of your home! Lily & Lime's easy-to-use website allows you to browse and book photographers near you, making booking a photographer feel like a sweet summer breeze! Just feed in the wedding city and the date of the event, and you will be presented with individualized wedding photography package options to take your pick from! The goal here is to make wedding photography one less thing to worry about so that you can go ahead and live your dream wedding.

Stunning Wedding Photography Near You

One of the many great things about Lily & Lime wedding photography is that we are conveniently located everywhere, no matter where in the country you might be! This makes us not only widespread, but a single point of contact to get all your wedding photography needs met, even if you are unsure about the wedding city! We are currently spreading happiness across 42 major cities around the country! This means your dreams are neither limited by budget or by location because we are basically everywhere and with the best of resources, too!

Stunning Wedding Photography Near You

We have the finest talents in all the big and small cities across the US, making us omnipresent and available for you to reach out to. From the bright lights of New York to the serene blue waterfront cityscapes of Chicago, from the ragged mountainscape of Denver to the southern hospitality of Atlanta, we will be right by your side as you say "I Do," capturing the magical moments as and when they happen! No matter what the season, the mood of the wedding, what the location is like, or what the wedding venue offers, our Lily & Lime wedding photographers will be right there by your side, and adapting to the surroundings, capturing perfect pictorial tokens from your special day!

Stunning Wedding Photography Near You

Lily and Lime is an example of how not all monumental decisions in life need to be complicated. While some things can surely weigh heavy on your wedding responsibilities, choosing your wedding photographer does have to be that complicated! It can be easy, effortless, and simple, like it's meant to be. Like love itself! With a wedding photography experience that is as easy to book as it is to experience, Lily and Lime feel like second nature, almost serendipitous!

Stunning Wedding Photography Near You

No matter where you are and what your vision is, our network of wedding photographers and wedding videographers come to you and align with your expectations to make a vision come to life! And the ability to render prolific professional wedding photographers at a snap, it goes without saying that every couple will surely find themselves with an assortment of wedding memories that are nothing short of sheer perfection.

What makes Lily and Lime so special, you ask? Much like other photography names in the market, we are here to capture your wedding, but the difference is that we take your wedding planning stress and simplify. With the ease of use and the support you’ll get from engagement to anniversary, your celebrations become more special than ever, while we capture every bit of it! We take pride in bringing compassion and understanding to booking wedding photography, and we understand the importance of choosing the right wedding photographer and doing so with the budget in mind. Lily & Lime makes the art of photography look easy and smooth, bringing to you the best value in wedding photography services, without compromising on stunning quality. We make choosing us very easy, and you will see how!

Our goal is to not just capture memories but do so artfully, capturing each picture with a delicate hand and precision. In addition to wedding photography, we pour our hearts into wedding planning resources, too. Our blog section is home to tons of inspiration laid out for our budget-savvy brides, as we strive to make planning a wedding just as fun as it's meant to be, with none of the stress! From featuring hundreds of couples we have worked with, to the latest trends, tips and colors, one can scroll through and gather inspiration in abundance! If that is not inspiration enough, we also have our inspiration board tool, which is a fun way of visualizing what your day might look like, just by contributing a few wedding decisions. Whatever your vibe is and whatever your dream wedding looks like, whether you are a glam bride or a natural sustainable bride, Lily and Lime will do justice to it, and will be right there to capture the magic, and on a budget!

Witnessing two people in love come together and announcing their vows in front of their near and dear ones is the kind of magic we never got used to, even after years of witnessing it! Love still fascinates us and fuels our wedding photographers to capture iconic pictures, every time. And the results say it all! We, at Lily & Lime, can't stop radiating gratitude toward the love and acknowledgment that we have gathered throughout the years. Expanding into bridal shower and rehearsal dinner photography seemed a natural fit for us, as wedding photography has a special place in our hearts, and our happy clients are all the validation we need!

From personal reviews to being recognized by top wedding platforms through awards and accolades, to bringing home the WeddingWire Couple Choice Awards from 2018 to 2020, to The Knot Best of Weddings 2019 and 2020, we are overwhelmed by the acceptance we receive every day. Finding an affordable wedding photographer has always pushed eager couples to be restrictive with their expectations, but no more! With Lily and Lime, we promise that the cuts are on the payments, not on your dreams. By choosing Lily & Lime, you say "I do" to your dream wedding, without compromising on your wedding budget!
